abstract: A collector's personal booty becomes a fantasy hotel in Fez.
snippet: A collector's personal booty becomes a fantasy hotel in Fez.
lead_paragraph: If you travel over and over to the same place, you start to know people without really knowing them, exchanging a weak smile with a shopkeeper, a street sweeper, a waiter at the cafe. If the place is Provence, France, and you are interested in old things, especially textiles and folk costumes, you may have had a glancing acquaintance with the antiquarian Michel Biehn, an inescapable presence in the region from the late 1970s until last year.
